title: Nutrition and the pig
creator_credit: Bertram Tyrer, Dudley Birch, Unilever Films and Birch Hill Film Productions
brief_description: Shows research into the nutrition of the pig, whose digestive system strongly resembles that of humans. Explains how various problems are all related to specific nutritional deficiencies.
creator_credit_for_label: Bertram Tyrer, Dudley Birch, Unilever Films and Birch Hill Film Productions
